name: MakeALevel-BombDefuser
description:
Emergency! Bad guys have placed bombs around the Cake Factory. 
Defuse as many bombs as possible within 60 seconds to save it!!!    

Note: If the HTML version does not work, you can click the link at the bottom to download the PC version.

HOW TO PLAY

Left Arrow KeyMove Left                                                                                               Right Arrow KeyMove RightUp Arrow KeyDefuseSpacebarJumpEscapePause

Credits

  • Art assets from Pixel Adventure 1
  • VFX assets from Standard Assets (for Unity 2018.4)
  • Font from Press Start 2P (Google Font)
  • Made using Unity
